a.title: Open Document, Discount Internet Options Remote Learning

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

p.a: Principal of Newport City Elementary School

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: NEK VT Rocks! - Elaine Collins Recorded on 1/30/2020 at NEK-TV Studios - Newport, VT

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OwsYgb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: For new and returning students please click the link below for the Student Registration page.

Newport City Elementary School has openings for Pre-K students that will turn 3 or 4 years of age before September 1, 2020. You must be a resident within the North Country Supervisory Union. Please call Theresa Perrault at 334-2455 Ext. 4144 to register your child. Email:theresa.perrault@ncsuvt.org

New Kindergarten students : If your child will be 5 before September 1, 2020, you reside in Newport City and have not attended a pre-school program within our Supervisory Union please click on student registration above to register him/her or call Theresa Perrault at 334-2455 Ext. 4144. Email:theresa.perrault@ncsuvt.org

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.em: The mission of the Newport City Elementary School is to educate the whole child to become a caring, productive participant of the community.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc

img.alt: Suggestion Box for Website and Community Feedback

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Have a concern about the website? Need to comment about a school or the district? Add your suggestions here:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: North Country Supervisory Union (NCSU) provides educational opportunities without regard to race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital/civil union status, or any other characteristic protected by Federal or State law. NCSU provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.
For questions regarding this policy please contact: Leanne Desjardins 802-334-5847 ext. 2022 or Richard Smith 802-334-5847 ext. 2028
Copyright North Country Supervisory Union | 121 Duchess Ave Suite A | Newport, VT 05855-5517
